name: .WORLDPACK File Extension
summary: Learn about .WORLDPACK files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a WORLDPACK file with Cats Are Liquid: A Better Place (multiplatform) to import the worlds it contains. If you are playing A Better Place on an Android or iOS device, you can tap the file to import the worlds it contains. If you are playing A Better Place on PC, you must place your WORLDPACK file in the appropriate game directory (often the maps directory) to use it.

You can also open a WORLDPACK file with Microsoft Notepad (Windows), Apple TextEdit (Mac), or any other text editor, if you want to see the plain text data it contains. Keep in mind, however, that editing a WORLDPACK file may cause it to function incorrectly.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
